Name: Nokhal Android
Desc:
[作者]
    Nokhal
[简介]
This is a custom mode I made for myself to play on Android.
Features:
-100% Specter refinment chances
-No More Aggressive Animals
-Integration of Always Prepared into reincarnators (4 extra starting disciples, lot more starting ressources)
-Some of my blueprints
-Reincarnators matching each law:
Wud Hagu (Outer Crafter/Cook), Jian Xian (Grand Chariot), She Ka (Six Paths), Emo Yue (Sixteen Steps), Zhen Taiyang (True Sun), Xiangri Kui(Sunflower), Astol Fo (Human M, Primordial Symbols/Sunflower), Chun Yu (Jade Purity), Lianjin Shu (Alchemy), Tian Sutong (Heaven Stealing), Yin Yalan (Any), Cuni Sapi (Rabbit F, Body Cultivator), Yaoren Mao (Cat F, Any), Tig Ger (Tiger F, Any), Gono Gui (Human M, any)


<font color=#009600>To install on Android:</font>
Install Shizuku then use FV file explorer. Extract the mods zip content and move it to /storage/emulated/0/Android/data/com.GSQ.XiaWorld.googleplay/files/Mods
You may need to manually create the Mods folder. Each mod should have it's own folder within the Mods folder. Then you can activate the Mods from within the game tapping the tools icon in the main menu.
Nota Bene: Any mods reliant on UI changes/Keyboard shorcuts/3D models or Icons changes will not work on the android port without specific adaptation
Author: Nokhal
IncreasedDesc:
1.3: Reworked cultivator experiences, doubled yield of mining rocks, removed scripts not working on Android
1.1: Fixed Blueprints not working on Android, added cultivators
1.0: Initial release
